OpenCV Tutorial

Abstract

In this series, we are going to talk about OpenCV using python. In near future we may create another tutorial with CUDA too.

OpenCV Tutorial - Part 1

In this part , we are going to talk about how to read an image from a file, options for reading the image in case of its type , and the ways of how can we show it on the screen.
